description.p: At 2nd level, you gain the ability to inscribe a magical tattoo onto one willing creature other than yourself at the end of a long rest. The tattoo remains until you finish your next long rest.
As a bonus action, the creature can activate the tattoo, causing it to flare with arcane power for 1 minute. Choose one of the following tattoos when you inscribe it:

ul.li: Ward of Ink. The creature gains a +2 bonus to AC.
Strike of Ink. Once per turn, when the creature hits with a weapon attack, it deals extra damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.
Glyph of Vigor. At the start of each of its turns, the creature gains temporary hit points equal to your Intelligence modifier.

description.p: Once activated, the tattoo’s magic is expended when the effect ends, and the tattoo fades. A creature can’t benefit from more than one Shared Ink tattoo at a time.

sheet.description: At the end of a long rest, inscribe a magical tattoo on one willing creature (not yourself). The creature can activate it as a bonus action to gain one of three effects for 1 minute: +2 AC, extra weapon damage equal to your Int modifier, or temporary hit points equal to your Int modifier each turn. Only one Shared Ink tattoo can affect a creature at a time.
